H0.text: When was the sculpture of the four faces on Mount Rushmore begun. 1915

H1.text: When was the sculpture of the four faces on Mount Rushmore begun. 1920

H2.text: When was the sculpture of the four faces on Mount Rushmore begun. 1923

H3.text: When was the sculpture of the four faces on Mount Rushmore begun. 1927

A4.text: Construction began in 1927 and the presidents' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939.

A5.text: The dedication ceremony was held on August 10, 1927, and carving of the sculpture got underway in October 4.
